name: Joybound People & Pets - Community Veterinary Care
description: Low-cost medical care for dogs and cats for eligible residents
fullDescription: Joybound People & Pets (formerly Tony La Russa's ARF) provides low-cost veterinary care to help Contra Costa County residents keep their pets healthy.
whatTheyOffer:
- Low-cost medical exams and treatments
- Vaccinations at reduced prices
- Basic diagnostic services
- Care for dogs and cats
- Income-based pricing available
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Contra Costa County resident
2. Contact Joybound to verify eligibility
3. Provide proof of income if applying for reduced rates
4. Schedule appointment for your pet
5. Pay reduced fee at time of service
